Name: Grapefruit Daiquiri #2
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: *Note: Angostura aromatic bitters contain alcohol but in the finished drink the alcohol level is negligible. Balanced and adult but cries out for rum.
History: Created in 2006 by Audrey Saunders, New York, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Grapefruit Daiquiri #2 contains 77 calories
